summary: WAS SMELLING GAS FUMES INSIDE MOTORHOME. HAD NOTIFIED MANUFACTURER & WAS INFORMED TO TAKE VEHICLE TO REPAIR SHOP IN NASHVILLE TWICE. FIRST TIME INFORMED PROBLEM REPAIRED WHEN IT WASN'T.  OWNER FOUND PROBLEM. FUEL PUMP ON TANK & NOTICED "O" RING WAS MISSING. THAT SEALS LEAKED GAS FUMES. TAKING VEHICLE BACK TO DEALER. *AK
